Powers -- Female Dwarf Medieval Seasoned Adventurer
Attributes (9 Points):
Agility: d6 Smarts: d10 Spirit: d6 Strength: d6 Vigor: d12
Attribute Notes: Tough: +1 Vigor step
Skills (18 Points):
Academics: (sma) d6 Intimidation: (spi) d4 Spellcasting: (sma) d6
Athletics: (agi) d4 Notice: (sma) d6 Stealth: (agi) d6
Battle: (sma) d4 Occult: (sma) d4 Survival: (sma) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d6 Performance: (spi) d4 Thievery: (agi) d6
Faith: (spi) d6 Persuasion: (spi) d4
Healing: (sma) d4 Shooting: (agi) d4
Skill Notes: Outsider: -2 Persuasion (other races)
Size: 0
Advances: 7 Improvement Points: 18 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 8; Edge: 4; Skill: 6
Features
Edges (2 points): Arcane Background (Miracles); Fleet-Footed Hindrances: Doubting Thomas; Outsider; Secret; Stubborn Dwarf Features: Low Light Vision; Reduced Pace; Tough
Feature Notes:
Doubting Thomas: Insists on rationalizing supernatural events
Low Light Vision: Ignores penalties for dim and dark illumination
Secret: Hides knowledge to protect self or others from minor trouble
Stubborn: Never admits error
Combat
Parry: 5 (3) Cover: 4 Toughness: 9 (1) Pace/Run: 7/+d6
Armor: Cloth Jacket Shield: Large Polymer Shield Weapons: Crossbow (2d6 R15" AP 2); Heavy Crossbow (2d8 R10" AP 2); Light Club (d6+d4); Unarmed (d6+d0)
Combat Notes:
Fleet-Footed: +2 Pace/+1 Run step
Reduced Pace: -1 Pace/-1 Run step
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +6
Arcana
Power Count: 3 Power Points: 10
Powers:
Arcane Protection: (1 PP) R10" Foes suffer -2 (Raise -4) on arcane attacks and damage against target for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional target)
Banish: (3 PP) R10" Target suffers Shaken (Raise 1 Wound; Spirit neg), returns to native plane if incapacitated
Barrier: (2 PP) R10" Creates a 5" long by 1" high wall w/hardness 10 for 5 rd (+1 PP Barrier inflicts 2d4 damage; +1 PP Barrier has +2 hardness; +2 PP Shapes barrier; +1 PP Creates 10"x2" barrier)
Beast Friend: (1/Size PP) R10" Target can speak with and control beast actions for 10 min (+1 PP Target can use beast's senses)
Blast: (3 PP) R20" 2" radius inflicts 2d6 damage (Raise 3d6) (+0/+1 PP 1"/3" radius; +2 PP Inflicts 3d6 damage (Raise 4d6))
Blind: (2 PP) R10" Target suffers -2 on vision tasks (Raise -4) (Vigor neg 2 points (Raise 4) each rd) (+2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius; +1 PP Vigor-2)
Bolt: (1 PP) R20" Inflicts 2d6 damage (Raise 3d6) (+2 PP Inflicts 3d6 damage (Raise 4d6))
Boost/Lower Trait: (2 PP) R10" Target gains +1 Trait step (Raise +2) for 5 rd or suffers -1 Trait step (Raise -2) (Spirit recovers 1 step (Raise all) each rd) (+1 PP/additional target; +1 PP Spirit-2)
Burrow: (2 PP) R10" Allows target to merge into earth and move half Pace (Raise full) for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional target; +1 PP Allows burrowing through stone)
Burst: (2 PP) R9" Cone inflicts 2d6 damage (Raise 3d6) (+2 PP Inflicts 3d6 damage (Raise 4d6))
Confusion: (1 PP) R10" Target suffers Distracted and Vulnerable for 1 rd (Smarts neg (Raise Smarts-2)) (+2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius)
Damage Field: (4 PP) R10" Creatures adjacent to target suffer 2d4 damage for 5 rd (+2 PP 2d6 damage)
Darksight: (1 PP) R10" Target ignores 4 points (Raise 6 points) of illumination penalties for 1 hr (+1 PP/additional target)
Deflection: (3 PP) R10" Foes suffer -2 attacks (Raise -4) on target for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional target)
Detect/Conceal Arcana: (2 PP) R10" Target can detect supernatural effects (Raise also type) for 5 rd or conceals target aura (Detect neg) for 1 hr (+1 PP/additional target; +1/+2 PP 2"/3" radius; +1 PP Detect-2)
Disguise: (2 PP) R10" Target assumes another's appearance (familiar Notice-2 sees through (Raise Notice-4)) for 10 min (+1 PP/additional target; +1 PP Allows changing size by 2 steps)
Dispel: (1 PP) R10" Ends targeted power (Casting suffers -2 if backgrounds differ; opposed arcane skill neg) (+1 PP Disrupts magic item for 1 rd (Raise 2 rd))
Divination: (5 PP) RSelf 1 min contact with otherworld force grants arcane skill roll to gain information
Drain Power Points: (2 PP) R10" Drains 1d6 Power Points (Cast suffers -2 if backgrounds differ; Raise adds drained Power Points to self; Spirit neg)
Elemental Manipulation: (1 PP) R10" Self performs minor elemental manipulation for 5 rd
Empathy: (1 PP) R10" Self learns target emotions and surface thoughts, gaining +1 Intimidation, Persuasion, Performance, and Taunt (Raise +2; Spirit neg) for 5 rd
Entangle: (2 PP) R10" Restrains target (Raise binds; Athletics or breaking Hardness 5 frees) (+2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius; +2 PP Athletics-2, Hardness 7)
Environmental Protection: (2 PP) R10" Target gains protection from hazards and -4 damage from like sources (Raise -6) for 1 hr (+1 PP/additional target)
Farsight: (2 PP) R10" Target sees up to 1 mile for 5 rd (Raise halves range penalties) (+1 PP/additional target)
Fear: (2 PP) R10" Target Extra flees, Wild Card rolls on fear table (Spirit neg; Raise Spirit-2, fear table +2) (+2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius)
Fly: (3 PP) R10" Target gains fly Pace 12 (Raise Pace 24) for 5 rd (+2 PP/additional target)
Growth/Shrink: (2/Size PP) R10" Target gains or loses Toughness and Strength step (Spirit neg) for 5 rd
Havoc: (2 PP) R10" Distracts and throws 2d6" creatures in 2" radius or 9" cone (Strength neg) (+1 PP 3" radius; +1 PP Strength-2)
Healing: (3 PP) RTouch Restores 1 Wound (Raise 2) suffered in past hr (+10 PP Restores older Wound; +20 PP Heals crippling injury; +1 PP Neutralizes poison or disease)
Illusion: (3 PP) R10" Creates 2" radius visual illusion (Smarts neg; Raise Smarts-2) for 5 rd (+1 PP Illusion includes sound; +2 PP Smarts-2)
Intangibility: (5 PP) R10" Target becomes unaffected by physical world (Spirit neg) for 5 rd
Invisibility: (5 PP) R10" Target becomes invisible; foes suffer -4 sight-based actions (Raise -6) for 5 rd (+3 PP/additional target)
Light/Darkness: (2 PP) R10" Creates 3" radius (Raise or 5" beam) bright light or darkness for 10 min (+1 PP Attaches to object or moves effect 6"/rd)
Mind Link: (1 PP) R10" Two targets may communicate up to 1 mile telepathically (Raise 5 miles) for 30 min; Wound to one shakes the other (Smarts neg) (+1 PP/additional target)
Mind Reading: (2 PP) R10" Self gains 1 truthful answer from target (Smarts neg)
Mind Wipe: (3 PP) R10" Target forgets up to 30 min (Raise several hour) event (Smarts neg) after 1 min activation (+1 PP Edits memory; +2 PP Activate power as an action)
Object Reading: (2 PP) RTouch Self sees five yr of events that occurred w/in 10 yd of target (Raise 100 yr and 20 yd) (+2 PP Self sees events beginning with target creation)
Protection: (1 PP) R10" Target gains +2 Armor (Raise +4) for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional target; +1 PP +4 Armor (Raise +6); +1 PP Target gains Toughness instead of Armor)
Puppet: (3 PP) R10" Target obeys self (Raise complete control; Spirit neg) for 5 rd (+2 PP/additional target)
Relief: (1 PP) R10" Target recovers 1 fatigue level or Shaken (Raise 2 levels or Stunned) (+1 PP/additional target)
Resurrection: (30 PP) RTouch Successful -8 casting roll returns 1 yr corpse to life with 3 Wounds and 2 fatigue (Raise 0 Wounds) (+5 PP Raises 10 yr corpse)
Shape Change: (3+ PP) RSelf transforms into animal form (Raise +1 Strength and Vigor) for 5 rd (+1 PP Allows speech while changed)
Sloth/Speed: (2 PP) R10" Target suffers half Pace (Raise movement is an action; Spirit ends) or gains dbl Pace (Raise ignores -2 running penalty) for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional Speed target; +2/+3 PP Sloth slows all in 2"/3" radius; +2 PP Speed reduces target multi-action penalty by 2; +1 PP Sloth Spirit-2)
Slumber: (2 PP) R10" Target sleeps (Spirit neg; Raise Spirit-2) for 1 hr (+2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius)
Smite: (2 PP) R10" Target weapon inflicts +2 damage (Raise +4) for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional target)
Sound/Silence: (1 PP) R50" Creates sound up to shout (Smarts neg) or R10" mutes 3" radius for 5 rd (+1 PP May move effect 6"/rd; +0 PP Affects target (Spirit neg); +1 PP/additional targets)
Speak Language: (1 PP) R10" Target speaks unknown language for 10 min (+1 PP/additional target)
Stun: (2 PP) R10" Stuns target (Vigor neg; Raise Vigor-2) (+2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius)
Summon Ally: (2+ PP) R10" Creates obedient servant (Raise servant may take 1 Wound) for 5 rd (+1 PP Servant can bite/claw for Str+d6 damage; +2 PP Servant has fly Pace 12; +1 PP Self can use servant's senses)
Telekinesis: (5 PP) R20" Moves items remotely as Strength d10 (Raise d12; Spirit neg) for 5 rd
Teleport: (2 PP) R10" Target teleports 12" (Raise 24") (+1 PP/additional target; +2 PP Touch teleports foe (Spirit neg))
Wall Walker: (2 PP) R10" Target moves at half Pace (Raise full Pace) on vertical and inverted surfaces for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional target)
Warrior's Gift: (4 PP) R10" Target gains combat edge effects (Raise improved version) for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional target)
Zombie: (3+ PP) R10" Animates and controls corpse for 1 hr or stores PP for permanent (+1 PP/additional target; +1 PP Target is armed; +1 PP Target has 2 Armor points; +1 PP Self can use target senses)
Common Power Modifiers: +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
Arcana Notes: Arcane Background (Miracles): 3 Powers/10 Power Points
